events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer role and appreciate your interest in joining our tech team.
The application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster based on the role applied for.
We assigned a dedicated recruiter to your profile to guide you through the next steps in the software engineering recruitment process.
Our recruiter conducted the initial screening call to better understand your experience and assess your fit for the engineering position.
Thank you for your prompt and detailed response regarding your software development background and project experience.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our lead engineer to dive deeper into your coding skills and problem-solving capabilities.
Your technical interview went well, and the interviewers were impressed by your problem-solving approach and coding proficiency.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your cultural fit, work preferences, and any remaining questions about the role.
The HR interview was completed successfully, and you demonstrated great alignment with the company's values and team environment.
We are excited to propose a formal offer for the Software Engineer position, including a competitive salary and benefits package.
The candidate has given positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm about potentially joining our engineering team.
We are pleased to confirm that the candidate has accepted the offer to join us as a Software Engineer.
The onboarding process has officially started, including orientation sessions and initial training for the new software engineer.
The hiring process for the Software Engineer role has been successfully completed with the new hire fully integrated into the engineering team.
